body.name: LEYAOYAO Cube Bookshelf 3 Tier Mid-Century Rustic Brown Modern Bookcase with Legs,Retro Wood Bookshelves Storage Organizer Shelf,Freestanding Open Book Shelves for Bedroom,Living Room,Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 51 mins
features: 【Vibrant Mid-Century Modern Bookshelf】 The 3 tier bookshelf is brought to life by a special mysterious brown and crisscross partition design. The unique appearance allows you to enjoy both retro and modern styles. Reshape your storage space with LEYAOYAO’s charming vintage brown modern cube bookshelves, making your home/office/school more elegant and stylish.

【Reliable Materials & Sturdy Structure】This durable 3 shelf bookcase is made of high quality board with high glossy finish veneer. Single weight capacity of each open cube shelf is up to 35 lbs. The canted legs of this standing bookcase are environmentally friendly thick plastic supported by four metal screws for extra stability.

【Suitable Size & Great Display】The simple upright and open design of the book shelves can help you to save much more space in your house. This brown bookshelf can be used as a storage shelf organizer and display shelf rack. Fill this creative display cabinet with your favorites! Choose a best display organizer for your books, CDs, magazines, and collections! Product size:31.5"L x 9.45" W x 43.31" H

【Thicker Packaging & Easy to Install】 We packaged the bookcases particularly with thickened foams and firmed edges to protect it in good condition upon arriving. The rustic wood bookshelf comes with step-by-step instructions, all numbered parts and extra tools for your convenience.
【Considerate Details】All decorative wood cube storage organizer bookshelves come with full unit back pieces to prevent the shelf from wobbling or separating apart.
body.description: 7 cube 3 shelf Bookcase - A great way for storage and display at home and in the office. As an essential piece for every home,our wooden bookshelf stands out with its elegant modern minimalist style and high-end design concept. The rustic brown tones of the shelves will amplify the mysterious, warm atmosphere without stealing the show of your books,and its neutral property can merge with a wide range of interior arrangement. Material: Particle board Product Color: Vintage brown Product Size:31.5"L x 9.45" W x 43.31" H（80x24 x110 cm ） Size of small cubes:11.81" x9.84" Size of large cubes:11.81" x14.96" Load Capacity of Each Shelf: 35lb（7 Cube bookshelf） Package Contents: 1 x Bookcase , 1 x Assembly Instruction, 1 x Anti-Tip Kit,All installation tools

Enough security Bookshelf with anti-tipping device--We have equipped the bookshelf with a set of anti-tipping device, which will further enhance the stability of the bookshelf. Although our improved cube bookshelf is stable enough, we still recommend that you install our anti-tip device for absolute safety. Wood grain carved decorative legs： The heightened Wood grain carved decorative shelf legs design increases the height and stability at the same time, which makes the appearance of the bookshelf more three-dimensional and stylish. This is just the right height, suitable for your vacuum cleaner to work, and can make the sweeping robot shuttle freely.If you don’t want to install this bookshelf leg, then it must also be a good wooden storage shelf. Stylish wood compartment storage： The days of worrying about the piles of heavy books are gone forever,3 shelf bookcase with 7 deep cubes make the organized storage more convenient and orderly.Open design allows you to grab your items with ease. 2 sizes of grids can meet your needs for different sizes of books and collectibles.The smooth edges and thicker plates help you carry more weight.Big albums, heavy encyclopedias, sturdy crafts... Unexpected design details： Bookshelf with back panel--All decorative storage cube organizers come with full unit back pieces to prevent the shelf from wobbling or separating apart. Design upgrade: We have deliberately added the edge-sealing card slot design of the backplane, which brings you a more relaxed installation experience and makes the backplane more stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as Described
reviews.reviewText: Tl;dr: I couldn't be happier with the finished product. For the overall price this was exactly what I wanted. Overall easy to assemble, dimensions as described, and color accurate to product photos. The material may not be the sturdiest for heavier items.All of the parts came secure in the box, everything was cushioned by Styrofoam and placed neatly. This also came with everything needed to assemble (all labeled clearly) including a small screwdriver and parts for securing to the wall. As others have mentioned the legs are plastic which might be something to keep in mind if wanting to use for heavier items.The assembly was very easy and the instructions were clear. The legs were slightly more difficult to screw in but still easy enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice shelf. Works wonderfully!!!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my grandkids room to replace a broken bookcase and a doll house that was way too big for their room. It has worked wonderfully. The only thing I didn’t catch in the other reviews or in the description is that the legs are plastic. I really thought they were wood. But it still is very nice. I love that it is elevated. Makes the floor look less crowded. And can be extra storage. My kids have Barbie cars under it like they are in a garage. But this worked exactly how I thought it would. The little cubbies are different rooms for the Barbie dolls and we use the bottoms ones as book holders. The instructions were easy to follow. It was put together very easily by one person. The child safety that attaches it to the wall works very good. And I feel secure and safe to let my grand kids play with it. When My grandkids came home and saw it they absolutely loved it. Saved a bunch of space in their room!!!! And it’s much more organized!! The color is exactly like the picture was on Amazon! I now want to get another one for my living room. A different color though. Of course it holds much more than in the picture. Kids have been hard at play and making memories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and decent quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Taking the price into consideration this is a pretty good bookshelf to buy.Package comes in a fairly compact box and took me about 20 mins for assembly. The main panels are not wood, but have what looks to be a durable wood like vinyl finish. The feet are lightweight molded plastic. Hardware included pretty comprehensive, even includes a basic screwdriver for those that don't have one.When assembled, the bookcase is pretty lightweight and fairly stable side to side. Front to back it does pose a risk of tipping - I recommend some sort of wall anchor if you have kids or if it's going be in an area where it gets bumped.The plastic feet do not have any sort of rubber grip or felt under, and are non adjustable for leveling. May need to use a shim for stability. Do not overtighten the screws for the feet as you'll strip the mounting holes. If I had to point out a weak spot, it would be the feet. Careful with any sort of pressure or force on them other than from top to bottom when moving the unit. Again do not overtighten the screws.The screws that hold the 'wood' panels together are a good length, however they do protrude a tiny bit when tightened down. I did not try to tighten them further to get them flush for fear of stripping them or damaging the panel. It's only a tiny bit but it's there.Once loaded with books and some items, it does gain stability due to the additional weight - be mindful of weight distribution if unanchored, top-heavy will make it more tip prone.It's a handsome piece and for the price a good value. Furniture in general has gotten very expensive. It's not a piece you'll have for decades, but it'll hold up to daily use and some abuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Space Bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together! I did use my own screwdriver for the baby screws on the feet. Solid and Sturdy. Color has some blonde wood shading, so nice! Will hold quite a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look...
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bookshelf for my office at work. I love the splash of color it adds to the dull and dreary typical office furniture I have. Love the look it gives with that turquoise color! To make things better, it was super simple to assemble and all tools are included in the box. Very sturdy and good quality for what it is and the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I put this together by myself. It was easy and I love the way it looks. Seems durable enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little bookcase, cheap but cute
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for holding my books and all my nerd stuff! This is very cute :)Quality: If you've put together ikea furniture than you'll figure this out easily. It's particle board so don't go overboard with the Allen wrench or you'll hear cracking.Assembly: While building be aware that shelf H is not symmetrical so you could accidentally screw it in backwards, leaving no room for backing F to slide in the slots. Also make sure that ALL of the slots in step 1 are face up, on the sides and along the top. That is where backing F slides in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice bookshelf for small spaces. There were two issues that stood out that turned me off from giving this a higher rating: 1. the legs are cheaply designed compared to the rest of the unit. They are wrapped in tape that is printed with a faux wood grain design. This completely cheapens the design. 2. the screws for the legs were missing from the box and when I opted to purchase the screws based on the size mentioned in the instructions, they were too large for the holes. I ended up applying gorilla glue to adhere the legs to the unit. This was inconvenient. In general, it's a nice looking unit.
I put this together easily by myself. The instructions were simple and easy to follow. It’s sturdy and looks great. Love it!
Great little cube shelf. modern and sleek looking. Easy to follow picture instructions. Took me not even a hour to assemble by myself.
Wow!! Belle bibli!! Tres solide avec un truc pour fixer au mur pour ne pas que ca bascule! Juste parfait pour mes besoins!
Compact. Elegant. Great for books and decorative items. Sturdy. 👍🏼Recommended
The media could not be loaded. Durable, sturdy and my favorite peice in my livingroom.
